I have heard the sketchs are on a vendor in the Ocean of Tears. Also
someone post to the FlameVault that they have made a dagger mold that is
non-trivial at a pottery skill of 147.

Rokenn






>From: lawman@... (Thomas Mahn)
>Hiya fellow bards,
>
>The thing I hate the most is rumors so I am asking fer your help to end
>these rumors? With the newest patch we are supposedly able to combine
>tradeskills i.e. blacksmithg and pottery? There are new sketches out from
>what people say but boys and girls I went all over norrath shopping last
>night and was unable to find a single one. Has anyone successfully done
>this yet and if so please some help ? Ohh and if this is true I wonder if
>we can make new instruments with some kinda bonus? A mandolin with metal
>strings:) flutes with valves, a baby grand in our pocket:)
>
>Looking fer your help,
>Tribe
